    <descript>
      <abstract>This polygons represents buildings on the Fairfax campus in George Mason University in 2009.  </abstract>
      <purpose>The dataset is intended for researchers, students and others for reference and mapping purposes and may be used for any analysis related to campus incidents and  tracing changes of the campus layout. </purpose>
